name: Senior Front-end developer
description:
Greenscreens.ai is a SaaS platform offering ML and Data Science-based freight price predictions for the US logistics market. We are a fast-growing company, recently we raised a seed round of investment. Part of the engineering team work from an office in Vilnius, and part remotely. Ours headquarter, sales, analytics, and support are in the US.

We are looking for a Senior Front-end developer.


Main stack

  • Typescript
  • React
  • Webpack
  • MUI Components

Sub Stack

  • JavaScript
  • Node
  • Chrome extension
  • Yarn workspaces
  • CRACO
  • Jest
  • Cypress
  • GraphQL
  • Node
  • Sentry
  • React router
  • Lodash
  • Final form

Required

  • Good knowledge of JS
  • Good knowledge of HTML and CSS
  • Good enough knowledge of our main stack and the desire to improve that knowledge if needed
  • Readiness to adapt to our full stack
  • Knowledge and the desire to follow good programming practices
  • Love for building a great product for the user
  • Desire to continuously improve yourself, the product and the code base
  • Respect, work ethic, hard work
  • Ability to communicate in both written and verbal English

Advantages

  • Readiness to receive and provide constructive criticism
  • REST experience and knowledge
  • Back-end experience
  • Test development experience, TDD knowledge
